name: Black Whole
description: Black whole is a 2D side scroller where you control a black whole character embarking on an adventure through the universe to find peace within himself. The Black whole character is faced with many puzzles and challenges throughout his journey and uses his many abilities such as consuming foes and throwing dark matter which makes for unique and exciting gameplay. The game has a comedic and heartfelt story which puts the character through many hardships from which he learns many lessons but also meets bizarre characters which provide for comedic relief. The character is put into environments in space across the galaxy giving a dark and mysterious vibe that sets the tone of the game. The soundtrack will consist of synth tracks that give a feeling of mystery and exploration. The game will be made using unity and the code will use C#. All the art for the game will be made and animated using Aseprite.
